ModMetaData.name: [1001] Electric Braziers
ModMetaData.author: Inggo (original) & Kiame Vivacity (1.3) & papercrane1001 (current)
ModMetaData.description:
Provides an Electric Brazier that satisfies throne room requirements. Requires Royalty DLC installed. May not work for custom Empires and Royalty Titles.
Thanks to Solarius Scorch for the texture work.
Link to original: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2555623506
Like my mod? Donate at: https://ko-fi.com/papercrane1001
I use the MIT license: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT which mostly says that if you use my code, please give me credit.
GitHub at: https://github.com/papercrane1001/-1001-ElectricBraziers-Continued-
\n\nVersion 2.0.3 \nFor version 1.4, 1.5, and 1.6
